name: User Messages, General
description:
Returns all the messages for all the private conversations for the context user. Also used to search across all messages and post a message.
To return all private conversations for the context user, see User Conversations, General.

https://developer.salesforce.com/docs/atlas.en-us.chatterapi.meta/chatterapi/connect_resources_users_messages_general.htm

queryParams.description: You can send a single private message to many recipients (comma-separated list), but cannot send a private message to the Id of the runnning user. Specify either recipients or inReplyTo. Specify one or the other, not both
ID of an existing message that identifies which conversation this message is part of. Specify either recipients or inReplyTo. Specify one or the other, not both.
